resources.string:
The following feature is enabled with accessibility:
-opening of power menu

This can be utilised by a disabled person (for example with limited motor skills) to choose the device power mode to make using their device easier.

To keep this functionality working, this setting needs to remain on.
Please enable the accessibility service for this app to work. Tap on NATIVE POWER MENU, then the switch.
Setting up finished. You can now close this settings window.
Something went wrong. Please restart the app and try again.
